properties.name: operationMode
properties.description: How to pass data into the summarization chain

properties.name: Use Node Input (Binary)
properties.description: Summarize the binary data coming into this node from the previous one

properties.name: Use Document Loader
properties.description: Use a loader sub-node with more configuration options

properties.name: Advanced
properties.description: Use a splitter sub-node with more configuration options

properties.name: chunkSize
properties.description: Controls the max size (in terms of number of characters) of the final document chunk

properties.name: chunkOverlap
properties.description: Specifies how much characters overlap there should be between chunks

properties.name: options
properties.description: The name of the field in the agent or chainâ€™s input that contains the binary file to be processed

properties.name: summarizationMethodAndPrompts
properties.description: The type of summarization to run

properties.name: Refine
properties.description: Summarize the first document (or chunk). Then update that summary based on the next document (or chunk), and repeat.

properties.name: Stuff
properties.description: Pass all documents (or chunks) at once. Ideal for small datasets.

properties.name: batching
properties.description: Batch processing options for rate limiting

properties.name: delayBetweenBatches
properties.description: Delay in milliseconds between batches. This is useful for rate limiting.
